plot outline: Its a story about a retired man's endeavor to build a house and the challenges faced by him. The film is a remake of the Bollywood cult film, Khosla Ka Ghosla. Sathyanathan has just retired and buys a plot. His son is against it and wants to go to New York. A gang tries to cheat him out of his land. His son then steps in to help him with the help of Daddy.
title: Poi Solla Porom
plot: Its a story about a retired man's endeavor to build a house and the challenges faced by him. The film is a remake of the Bollywood cult film, Khosla Ka Ghosla. Sathyanathan has just retired and buys a plot. His son is against it and wants to go to New York. A gang tries to cheat him out of his land. His son then steps in to help him with the help of Daddy.::Praveen Ilangovan
